items.sentence: Tom suddenly realized that what he was doing was very dangerous.
The kindergarten children were walking hand in hand in the park.
Tom walked past Mary's house and didn't notice anything strange.
Tom had only planned on staying in Boston for just a day or two.
I thought that you said that you wanted to go swimming with Tom.
Tom said that he can speak French, but he can't really speak it.
Tom said he thought he wouldn't enjoy going to Boston with Mary.
Tom didn't know who Mary was planning on staying with in Boston.
I think Tom probably isn't as good at French as you think he is.
How long did it take you to save up enough money to buy a house?
